# Main


```{r}
dt <- tibble(
  target = c(1, 0, 1, 1, 0, 0),
  text = c("This is sample text", "And for sure a second one", "A third one should not be missing", "four items is almost six ones", "almost the final item in this list", "and lastly the last item of this exercise")
)
```


```{r}
param <- list(
  input_dim = 10,
  seq_len = 10,
  term_count_min = 1,
  text = "text"
)
g <- generator$new()
g$set_param(param)
g$set_data(dt)
g$fit_word_tokenizer()
g$tokenize_seq(parallel = F)
g$param
g$x

g$tokenize_seq(dt$text)
```
